recipesJson.name: Keyser Soze
recipesJson.author: ChefJohn
recipesJson.description:
The long con. 

This is a long cure recipe. Well worth the time. 

It's an old school unicorn milk, shot into a custard. 


Rich, Eggy and magical. 

Please leave a comment if you mix this!
